Flow.description: Added Mental Health Facility Outreach option
Flow.label: SafeSpace v2 - Assessment

value.stringValue: High Risks Identified, Visit Cannot Proceed

fields.name: AssessmentSubmittedText
fields.fieldText:
Assessment Submitted


Your assessment has now been submitted for approval to your manager ({!Manager.FullName__c})


Once it has been approved, you will then be able to complete the pre-visit checklist.


You may now close this screen by pressing Finish

fields.name: AssessmentSubmittedTextD
fields.fieldText:
Assessment Submitted


Your assessment has now been submitted for approval to the delegated approver ({!Manager.FullName__c})


Once it has been approved, you will then be able to complete the pre-visit checklist.


You may now close this screen by pressing Finish

fields.name: AssessmentSubmittedTextProvisionalApproval
fields.fieldText:
Assessment Submitted


Your assessment has been submitted and has been provisionally approved by your manager ({!Manager.FullName__c})


You can complete the pre-visit checklist prior to your manager providing formal approval.


Additionally, if your manager has not completed the final approval process after the outreach visit, the session and case note details can be recorded.

fields.name: BuddyMobileText
fields.fieldText:
Safe Space - Buddy Mobile

It looks like we don't have {!Buddy.FirstName}'s mobile number on file. Please enter it below.


If you do not know {!Buddy.FirstName}'s mobile number, please press "Previous" and select a different buddy. Do not enter a fake number.

fields.name: DurationNotValidText
fields.fieldText:
Safe Space - Visit Duration Not Valid

Please press "Previous" and select a valid duration for the visit

fields.name: FullAssessmentText
fields.fieldText:
Full Assessment

A Full Assessment is due for this participant.


Please review the below questions and provide the appropriate answers.

fields.name: COVID
fields.fieldText: Coronavirus & Other Infectious Diseases

fields.name: FullAssessmentRiskOfExposureToCovid19
fields.fieldText: Is there any risk of exposure to Covid19 Virus or other infectious disease?

fields.name: Cold_Call
fields.fieldText: Cold Call

fields.name: FullAssessmentRisksIdentifiedInReferral
fields.fieldText: Were risks identified in their referral?

fields.name: FullAssessmentChapter16A
fields.fieldText: Has Chapter 16A info identified risks?

fields.name: FullAssessmentRisksToFamily
fields.fieldText: Does the Chapter 16A information raise any concerns re risk to staff or stakeholders, in relation to the family and/or premises?

fields.name: FullAssessmentPoliceCheckRisks
fields.fieldText: Did police checks identify risks?

fields.name: FullAssessmentRecentPoliceEvents
fields.fieldText: Any recent police events?

fields.name: Violence
fields.fieldText: Violence

fields.name: FullAssessmentSuggestionOfAHistoryOfViolence
fields.fieldText: Is there any suggestion of history of violence?

fields.name: FullAssessmentSuggestionsOfCurrentViolence
fields.fieldText: Is there any suggestion of current violence?

fields.name: Mental_Health
fields.fieldText: Mental Health

fields.name: FullAssessmentHistoryOfMentalHealthIllness
fields.fieldText: Is there a history of a mental health illness?

fields.name: FullAssessmentOnCurrentMentalHealthCarePlan
fields.fieldText: Is the participant on a current mental health care plan?

fields.name: FullAssessmentNonCompliantWithTheirMedication
fields.fieldText: Is the client non-compliant with their medication?

fields.name: Other
fields.fieldText: Other

fields.name: FullAssessmentSuggestionHistoryOfIllegalActivity
fields.fieldText: Is there any suggestion of or history of illegal activities in the suggested meeting space?

fields.name: FullAssessmentBackgroundChecksBeenCompleted
fields.fieldText: Did Background Checks Identify Risks?

fields.name: FullAssessmentVisitingIsolatedLocation
fields.fieldText: Visiting Isolated / Remote Location?

fields.name: FullAssessmentBadMobileReception
fields.fieldText: Is there no or unreliable mobile coverage at the location of the home visit?

fields.name: Is_this_the_first_time_attending_the_client_s_residence
fields.fieldText: Is this the first time attending the client's residence?

fields.name: FullAssessmentOtherPeopleAround
fields.fieldText: Other People Around During the Visit?

fields.name: FullAssessmentLackOfCommitmentToRestrainDogs
fields.fieldText: Is there a Lack of Commitment to Restrain Dogs?

fields.name: FullAssessmentOtherIssuesReportedOrKnown
fields.fieldText: Are there other significant issues reported or known?

fields.name: FullAssessmentConcernedAboutConductingOutreach
fields.fieldText: Are you concerned about conducting outreach?

fields.name: MitigationText1
fields.fieldText: {!TextTemplateMitigation}

fields.name: HighRisksIdentifiedText
fields.fieldText:
High Risk(s) Identified


As High Risks have been identified, you cannot proceed with the outreach visit.


Please discuss with your manager to identify mitigation strategies for the high risks identified and restart the Safe Space process.

fields.name: High_Risks
fields.fieldText: High Risks

fields.name: HighRisksText
fields.fieldText: Please indicate if any of these high risks have been identified

fields.name: HighRisk_DangerousCollections
fields.fieldText: Does the client have dangerous collections ie gun, knife, bow and arrow or sword or other potentially harmful collections?

fields.name: HighRisk_ThreatenWithWeapons
fields.fieldText: Are they known to carry, use or have threatened anyone with a weapon in the past?

fields.name: HighRisk_DVSafetyPlan
fields.fieldText: Are there any known current or historical DV Safety Plans in place?

fields.name: HighRisk_IsDvPerpGoingToBeAtLocation
fields.fieldText: Is the perpetrator in the home/area?

fields.name: HighRisk_Other
fields.fieldText: Are there any Other High Risks? Such as historical/current violence, escalations, mental health instability, alcohol or substance abuse?

fields.name: Other_High_Risks
fields.fieldText: Other High Risks

fields.name: HighRisk_OtherText
fields.fieldText: Please add details about the other high risks identified below

fields.name: Mitigation_Strategies_Header
fields.fieldText: Mitigation Strategies

fields.name: HighRiskMitigationText
fields.fieldText: Please add details about mitigation strategies for all questions answered N/A (Risk Mitigated)

fields.name: Mitigation_Strategies
fields.fieldText: Mitigation Strategies

fields.name: Manager_Approval
fields.fieldText: Manager Approval

fields.name: ManagerAbsenceText
fields.fieldText:
Is your manager absent?


Your manager is: {!User.Manager.FullName__c}


{!User.Manager.FullName__c}'s delegated approver is: {!User.Manager.Safe_Space_Secondary_Approver__r.FullName__c}


If your manager is absent tick the box below to have the safe space approval sent to {!User.Manager.Safe_Space_Secondary_Approver__r.FullName__c}

fields.name: ManagerAbsenceCheckbox
fields.fieldText: Use my manager's delegated approver

fields.name: Provisional_Aprpoval
fields.fieldText: Provisional Approval

fields.name: ProvisionalApprovalCheckbox
fields.fieldText: If a manager is unable to approve this request in Hende pre-visit, you must obtain verbal approval and check the following box to activate the outreach visit. Please note: if the box is checked, your manager or Q&C must approve this request post-visit to complete the process.

fields.name: ManagerMobileText
fields.fieldText:
Safe Space - Manager Mobile

It looks like we don't have {!Manager.FirstName}'s mobile number on file. Please enter it below.


If you do not know {!Manager.FirstName}'s mobile number, please press "Next" to skip this process.


Do not enter a fake number.

fields.name: MissingMitigationText
fields.fieldText:
Mitigation Strategies is Empty


Mitigation Strategies cannot be blank if you answered "N/A (Risk Mitigated)" to one of the High Risk questions.


Please return to the previous page and enter details in the Mitigation Strategies Text Box.

fields.name: PartialAssessmentText
fields.fieldText:
Partial Assessment


It appears you recently conducted a Full Assessment in the last three months.


Please complete the below partial assessment.

fields.name: Coronavirus
fields.fieldText: Coronavirus & Other Infectious Diseases

fields.name: PartialAssessmentRiskOfExposureToCovid19
fields.fieldText: Is there any risk of exposure to Covid19 Virus or other infectious disease?

fields.name: Other_Partial_Assessment
fields.fieldText: Other

fields.name: PartialAssessmentIsTheParticipantOnACurrentMentalHealthCarePlan
fields.fieldText: Is the participant on a current mental health care plan?

fields.name: PartialAssessmentIsTheClientNonCompliantWithTheirMedication
fields.fieldText: Is the client non-compliant with their medication?

fields.name: Is_there_no_mobile_or_unreliable_mobile_coverage_at_the_location_of_the_outreach
fields.fieldText: Is there no mobile or unreliable mobile coverage at the location of the outreach?

fields.name: PartialAssessmentLackOfCommitmentRestrainDogs
fields.fieldText: Is there a Lack of Commitment to Restrain Dogs?

fields.name: PartialAssessmentOtherIssues
fields.fieldText: After speaking to the client are there any risks identified, associated with other people or pets?

fields.name: PartialAssessmentConcernedAboutConductingOutreach
fields.fieldText: After reviewing the clients records and speaking to the client do you have any concerns about going on outreach?

fields.name: MitigationText3
fields.fieldText: {!TextTemplateMitigation}

fields.name: MHFOAssessmentText
fields.fieldText:
Mental Health Facility Outreach Assessment


Please complete the below assessment.

fields.name: Mental_Health_Facility_Outreach_Details
fields.fieldText: Mental Health Facility Outreach Details

fields.name: Suggestion_of_a_History_of_Violence
fields.fieldText: Is there any suggestion of history of violence?

fields.name: Suggestion_of_Current_Violence
fields.fieldText: Is there any suggestion of current violence?

fields.name: Concerned_about_conducting_Outreach
fields.fieldText: Are you concerned about conducting outreach?

fields.name: Background_checks_been_completed
fields.fieldText: Has a background check been completed with DCJ, Police, Health or other agency (if relevant)?

fields.name: External_Internal_Worker_Present
fields.fieldText: Can you confirm that a second worker/buddy/external agency staff will be present during the outreach?

fields.name: Mitigation_Strategies_MHFO
fields.fieldText: {!TextTemplateMitigation}

fields.name: PreviousFullAssessmentHighRiskText
fields.fieldText:
Warning


The most recent Full Assessment ({!RecentFullAssessment.Date_of_Assessment__c}) identified High Risks.


You will not be able to proceed with a visitation until a new Full Assessment is completed.


Please press "Next" to start a new Full Assessment, or close this window if you do not wish to proceed.

fields.name: CheckedForUpdatedOutreachLocations
fields.fieldText: Prior to heading out, have checks been done to see if there is any updated information/intelligence re outreach locations from other stakeholders ie council rangers and risks have been identified.

fields.name: DoYouHaveAppropriateClothingPPE
fields.fieldText: Do you have clothing, footwear and sunscreen to protect you from sun damage and other location or environmental factors?

fields.name: IsWeatherOutlookLookingSafe
fields.fieldText: Have any extreme weather events forecasts or warnings been cancelled?

fields.name: RoughSleepersNoText
fields.fieldText: As you have answered "No" to one or more of the questions above. A joint risk assessment discussion with outreach partner is required, to decide if the engagement is going ahead. Agreements regarding continued engagement must be unanimous. If there is not agreement the engagement must not go ahead.

fields.name: SelectCaseText
fields.fieldText:
Please Select Case


This type of visit must be related to a Case. Please select the appropriate one using the lookup dialogue below.

fields.name: SelectManagerText
fields.fieldText:
No Manager Found


It looks like your user record doesn't have a manager / supervisor set on it yet.


Please use the below field to select your current manager / supervisor

fields.name: SelectProgramText
fields.fieldText:
Select Program


Please select the program this Safe Space Visit is related to.

fields.name: SelectedProgram
fields.fieldText: Program

fields.name: DurationNotValidText_0
fields.fieldText:
Safe Space - Visit Start Date/Time Not Valid

Please press "Previous" and select a Start Date/Time that is in the future

fields.name: UnknownRecordIdTypeText
fields.fieldText:
Error


Unknown RecordId Type: {!recordId}

fields.name: UserMobileText
fields.fieldText:
Safe Space - Mobile Number


It looks like we don't have your mobile number on file. Please enter it below.


Do not enter a fake number.

fields.name: WhatKindOfVisitScreenText
fields.fieldText: Safe Space Visit

fields.name: VisitType
fields.fieldText: Safe Space Visit Type

fields.name: Start_Date_Time_of_Visit
fields.fieldText: Start Date/Time of Visit

fields.name: DurationHours
fields.fieldText: Duration (Hours)

fields.name: DurationMinutes
fields.fieldText: Duration (Minutes)

fields.name: Location_of_Visit
fields.fieldText: Location of Visit

fields.name: LocationCategory
fields.fieldText: Location Category

fields.name: BuddyText
fields.fieldText:
Safe Space Buddy

Your Safe Space buddy will be notified if you don't check in or check out when conducting the outreach visit.


Please select an appropriate buddy from the field below.

textTemplates.name: TextTemplateMitigation
textTemplates.text:
Mitigation Strategies


Please detail any mitigation strategies you intended to use for any identified risks
